articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory
						
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, gave field guidance to the Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory.
					 Shaking hands with its officials one by one, he said that he came to learn about the production of the factory, built under the deep care of the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, and take a step for the provision of the best cosmetics to citizens while studying his instructions on the light industry.
					
					 He looked round the monument to Kim Jong Il's field guidance and mosaics erected in the compound of the factory.
					
					 Then he went round the cosmetic shop, soap shop, sample showroom and other parts of the factory to acquaint himself with its production and management and indicated the way for the factory to follow.
					
					 He told the officials to produce quality cream, perfume, lotion, lipstick, hair spray, toilet soap and other cosmetics with various functions and effects and push ahead with the development of natural, less irritant and functional cosmetics since everyone has his or her own taste and demand.
					
					 He said that the quality of cosmetics should be steadily improved to make the people like domestic cosmetics with Unhasu trademark better than imported ones and, furthermore, help Unhasu-trademarked cosmetics win popularity in international market. 
					
					 He urged the factory to push ahead with the work to put the updating of production lines on a higher level, arrange complete sets of analyzing and testing facilities badly needed for guaranteeing the quality and usage of cosmetics and improve the package and trademark design as required by the new century.
					
					 When he dropped in a newly-arranged room for sci-tech knowledge, he said it has become a trend to run such room in a regular way everywhere in the country. And he stressed the need for the factory to operate the room in an effective way so as to help its employees enrich their technical knowledge and skills.
					
					 Touring the Unhasu Health Complex at the factory, he said it was well built by its own efforts and appreciated its officials for working hard to provide the employees with better living conditions and environment.
					
					 He called for giving a complete facelift to the factory to turn itself into flawless modern one of which the country can boast to the world, a model and standard cosmetics factory, saying that he would help carry out the project.
					
					 He said that the Party is deeply concerned about the factory and a turning point should be brought in developing the cosmetic industry this year. And he had a photo session with the employees of the factory, expressing belief that they would discharge their honorable duty with credit.
					
					 Accompanying him were An Jong Su and Han Kwang Sang, department directors, Ri Jae Il, first vice department director, and Kim Yo Jong and Sin Man Gyun, vice department directors of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Apparatuses for Experiment and Practice to Kim Il Sung University
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Apparatuses for Experiment and Practice to Kim Il Sung University
						
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent latest apparatuses for experiment and practice needed for education and scientific researches to Kim Il Sung University.
					 Kim Jong Un put forward the education of younger generations as the most important work on which the rise or fall of the country hinge and indicated the road of drastically improving education in the new century. He also showed great benevolence to turn the university into the highest seat where the Juche-oriented education science is applied.
					
					 The apparatuses reflect his intention to defend President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il's idea of attaching importance to education and their feats and bring about a great turn in the education and thus glorify the DPRK as the country of education and a country of a contingent of talents.
					
					 A meeting for conveying the apparatuses took place on Wednesday.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Accused of Hurting DPRKã€€
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Accused of Hurting DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- Lee Myung Bak, a traitor to the nation, should have been severely punished by the nation and thrown into the dumping ground of history. However, he published his "memoir" recently in which he misinterpreted the course of the informal north-south contacts in a bid to dare hurt the DPRK.
					 A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea released a statement on Thursday in this regard:
					
					 What Lee described in his "memoir" is touching off astonishment and derision as he revealed his true colors as an idiot. 
					
					 It is the height of impudence that he took issue with the past north-south summits and utterly misinterpreted the course of discussion by making profound confusing of right and wrong.
					
					 We can elaborate on what happened. But we would like to just recall that whenever he found himself in deepening ruling crisis during his tenure of office, Lee reached out to the DPRK in a bid to seek a way out, talking about "dispatch of a special envoy" and "summit." He pretended to do some favor for the north each time.
					
					 The DPRK has all evidence to prove such fact.
					
					 His recent reckless act of malignantly hurting the DPRK by misrepresenting the course of the informal north-south contacts once again brought to light before the world his true colors as thrice-cursed depraved politician and base philistine.
					
					 Lee's recent publication of his "memoir" peppered with lies is aimed at evading his responsibility for driving the north-south relations into the worst catastrophe and chilling the atmosphere for mending the north-south relations now growing strong and divert elsewhere the public criticism of his thrice-cursed crimes.
					
					 The DPRK cannot but express serious concern about whether it will be possible to discuss the important issue of the nation with reckless guys of south Korea as brazen-faced as Lee.
					
					 Lee would be well advised to write "a memoir" repenting of his acts of treachery as he deserves history's stern punishment. 
					
					 The DPRK will closely follow the developments in south Korea.

articles.title: Events Held to Mark Feb. 8
articles.content:
Events Held to Mark Feb. 8
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting with DPRK hero and an art performance by the Workers' Art Group of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea at the Central Hall of Workers on Thursday to mark February 8 when the Korean regular armed forces were founded. 
					 Present at the meeting were Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the C.C., the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, officials and members of the union and workers.
					
					 At the meeting DPRK Hero Kim Sung Un, lecturer at the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, made a speech.
					
					 He said that President Kim Il Sung put forward the line of building the army after the liberation of Korea and developed the Korean People's Revolutionary Army into the Korean People's Army, modern regular armed forces, performing the undying feats in the history of the building of the revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 These regular revolutionary armed forces beat back the U.S. imperialists' invasion to swallow up the DPRK in its cradle and demonstrated the dignity and honor of the country and nation, the speaker noted.
					
					 He said that he shot down five planes of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and was awarded the title of DPRK hero in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Then followed an art performance given by the workers' art group.
					
					 Put on the stage were choruses "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" and "Song of the Korean People's Army", poem reciting trio "We Will Convey Long the Undying Feats Performed in Army Building", poem and chorus "Revolutionary Armed Forces Uphold Leadership of Marshal Only" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the undying feats performed by Kim Il Sung who built the modern and powerful regular armed forces after Korea's liberation and those of leader Kim Jong Il who developed the Korean People's Army into the army of the leader and the party and the invincible elite revolutionary army, holding high the banner of Songun.

articles.title: Women's Union Observes February 8
articles.content:
Women's Union Observes February 8
						
  Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting at the Women's Hall on Thursday to tell stories about the noble virtues of President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of significant February 8.
					 He proclaimed the founding of the Korean regular armed forces on Feb. 8, Juche 37 (1948).
					
					 Kang Yong Hwa who is a daughter of Kang Kon, an anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter, said that Kim Il Sung regarded the issues arising in building the army after Korea's liberation as the most important affairs, paid primary attention to them and successfully accomplished the cause of building the regular revolutionary armed forces in a short span of time.
					
					 Her father assumed the important duty as chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army at the age of 30 under the particular loving care and trust of Kim Il Sung, and had the greatest honor of commanding the parade ranks on the day when the birth of the regular armed forces was proclaimed, she noted.
					
					 Sim Kyong Suk, doctor of the Puksae Polyclinic in Moranbong District, said that DPRK hero Ri Hwal, her father-in-law, grew up to be an officer of merit who left a clear trace in the history of the Air Force under the care of the peerless great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 War veteran Rim Chan Ju noted that in the Fatherland Liberation War unknown soldiers grew up to be combat heroes under the care of Kim Il Sung, displaying their valor at battles, and greatly contributed to the victory in the war. Then she sang song "My Husband Became Hero".
					
					 The performers stressed that the Korean revolutionary armed forces led by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un would always win victory after victory, regarding it as their maxim to devotedly defend the leader.

articles.title: Korean Film Show Held
articles.content:
Korean Film Show Held
						
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- A Korean film show took place at the Taedongmun Cinema on Thursday to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 Present there on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys, representatives of international organizations and foreign embassy officials here. 
					
					 On hand were Kim In Bom, vice-minister of Culture and general director of the General Bureau of Film, officials concerned and creators and artistes in the field of film art.
					
					 The participants watched a Korean feature film which shows the spiritual world of service personnel who are glorifying their youth while defending the country, cherishing absolute trust and pure moral obligation towards their leaders.

articles.title: New Poster of 19th Kimjongilia Festival Produced
articles.content:
New Poster of 19th Kimjongilia Festival Produced
						
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- A poster of the 19th Kimjongilia Festival to be held on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was produced.
					 Depicted on the poster is Mt. Paektu, the holy mountain of the revolution. Seen there are letters "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il will always be with us" and Kimjongilias in full bloom.
					
					 Printed there are letters "The Day of the Shining Star" and the logo of the festival in the upper part of the poster and the letters "The 19th Kimjongilia Festival" and the venue and period of the festival in its lower part.

articles.title: Bilateral Renal Prosthetic Bypass Succeeded
articles.content:
Bilateral Renal Prosthetic Bypass Succeeded
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- The Korea General Red Cross Hospital succeeded in bilateral renal prosthetic bypass. 
					 In this regard, Kim Yong Chol, a vice-director of the hospital, told KCNA:
					
					 Different methods have been applied to curing nephropathies in the world. One of those nephropathies is renal arterial stenosis, which can be found mainly among women under 40.
					
					 The bilateral renal prosthetic bypass has been an exclusive property of some developed countries.
					
					 Ri Yong Jin, a doctor who performed the bypass operation, said:
					
					 The patient was a 23 year-old woman suffering from bilateral renal arterial stenosis. After the operation, her blood pressure returned to normal and symptoms of nephropathies were removed. 
					
					 The result of the operation shows that surgical operation is better than drug treatment in curing renal arterial stenosis.

articles.title: KPA Emerged Victorious under Slogan of "A-Match-for-a-Hundred"
articles.content:
KPA Emerged Victorious under Slogan of "A-Match-for-a-Hundred"
						
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- More than five decades have passed since the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu put up the slogan "A-Match-for-a-Hundred". 
					 President Kim Il Sung visited snow-covered Taedoksan Post situated on the forefront and put up the militant slogan "A-Match-for-a-Hundred" for the Korean People's Army (KPA) on February 6, Juche 52 (1963). 
					
					 That day leader Kim Jong Il said that the slogan put up by the President reflected the need for all the service personnel to become each  "A-Match-for-a-Hundred" not only in defence but also in attack, indicating the way to do so. 
					
					 The validity and vitality of the slogan have been clearly proved in the glorious course of the KPA which has firmly defended the lifeline of the Juche revolution with arms and carried forward the victorious history and tradition in defence of socialism and standoff with U.S.-led imperialists. 
					
					 When the anti-party, counter-revolutionary elements blatantly challenged the party after the war, the service personnel defended the party and the leader at the cost of their lives and they carved the slogan on a natural rock and invariably upheld the idea and line of the party as the unshakable revolutionary faith and will when the undesirable elements opposed the party's military line for self-defence and the slogan. 
					
					 The enemy's Escort Craft 56 was sunken and the U.S. spy ship Pueblo was captured while intruding into the inviolable waters of the DPRK. And the U.S. large-sized spy plane EC-121 was shot down while intruding into the territorial air of the DPRK in April 1969. These miserable ends of the aggressors showed the world the might and spirit of the KPA equipped with the spirit of "A-Match-for-a-Hundred". 
					
					 KPA service personnel crushed GIs in this spirit during the Panmunjom incident provoked by them in August 1976. 
					
					 The U.S. helicopter OH-58A/C was shot down when it intruded deep into the territorial air of the DPRK in December 1994. 
					
					 When the enemies fired bullets and shells at the DPRK to kick up a war racket in July 1997, the KPA promptly took a measure for self-defence, blowing up the enemy's den in a twinkle. 
					
					 Seamen and coastal artillerymen of the KPA destroyed enemy warships and showed the enemy what the strike of the powerful Paektusan revolutionary army was like in several skirmishes on the West Sea and the shelling on Yonphyong Island caused by the enemy's provocations. 
					
					 Satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 was successfully launched into space, demonstrating the invincible might of Songun Korea in April 2009. It is also associated with proud feats of the Korean revolutionary armed forces led by the great brilliant commanders of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 The KPA has steadily grown stronger to be a reliable scouting party of the Songun revolution and strong pillar firmly guaranteeing the party's cause with arms, upholding Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un who is ushering in the greatest heyday of bolstering up the military muscle.

articles.title: Feats of KPA Guards Units (3)
articles.content:
Feats of KPA Guards Units (3)
						
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- The Guards 2nd Torpedo Boat Squadron of the Korean People's Army is well known for creating a myth in the world history of sea battles during the 1950-1953 Korean War.
					 The squadron of four torpedo boats engaged in a battle against the U.S. detached fleet with 17 300-ton heavy cruiser "Baltimore" as a capital ship in the waters off Jumunjin in the early morning of July 2, Juche 39 (1950).
					
					 The squadron worked a world-startling miracle by torpedoing "Baltimore" and damaging the light cruiser, which has been unprecedented in the history of sea battles.
					
					 The Navy of the Korean People's Army was founded on August 28, 1949. At that time, President Kim Il Sung inspected the squadron, encouraging its seamen to equip themselves with high fighting spirit and unrivaled bravery.
					
					 The squadron was awarded the title of Guards in August 1950.
					
					 When inspecting the squadron in April 2012, Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un praised the unit for its feats, calling upon the seamen of the unit to steadfastly carry on the revolutionary spirit of their forerunners.

articles.title: Feats of KPA Guards Units (4)
articles.content:
Feats of KPA Guards Units (4)
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- The Guards 56th Fighter Regiment of the Korean People's Army (KPA) performed distinguished feats in the Fatherland Liberation War (June 25, 1950-July 27, 1953).
					 From the beginning of the war, the regiment gave air support to the KPA ground units advancing southward by employing tactics indicated by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 In June Juche 39 (1950), a pilot of the regiment shot down a U.S. "B-29" in the skies of Seoul at a distance of 300 meters.
					
					 As ordered to support the operation for liberating Taejon City, its pilots downed four "B-29"s and two "F-80"s and destroyed many enemy targets including ammunition trains, making a big contribution to achieving the victory in the operation.
					
					 The regiment was awarded the title of Guards in July 28, 1950.
					
					 The regiment shot down seven "F-86"s in the skies of Seoul in June 1953.
					
					 During the war, it downed or damaged over 90 enemy planes, sank or destroyed 11 warships and destroyed hundreds of vehicles.
					
					 The regiment produced 5 awardees of the title of the DPRK Hero during the war.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Interference in Internal Affairs of Korean Nation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Interference in Internal Affairs of Korean Nation 
						
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- It is the U.S. which the Korean nation should strictly guard against and resolutely reject in the struggle for achieving independent reunification, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The history of north-south confrontation is the anti-reunification and crime-woven history of the U.S. as it has alienated the north and the south and escalated the distrust and confrontation while deliberately interfering in internal affairs of the Korean nation.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations are deteriorating day by day, far from reaching the orbit of improvement, and such serious development is a product of the U.S. vicious anti-reunification moves.
					
					 The U.S. remains unchanged in its anti-reunification nature. It is becoming evermore undisguised in its moves at a time when all the Koreans are turning out as one to glorify this year marking the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation as a significant one to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification.
					
					 The joint military drills and leaflet scattering operations against the DPRK going on in south Korea are the main factors of disturbing the improvement of the inter-Korean relations. It is impossible to hold trust-based dialogue and improve the relations between the north and the south unless these moves are halted.
					
					 Needless to say, the U.S. is to blame for the failure of the north and the south to mend their relations despite the DPRK's important proposal reflecting the will to put an end to the inglorious history of confrontation with compatriots and write a new history of inter-Korean relations and efforts to realize it. 
					
					 Owing to the U.S. interference in internal affairs of the Korean nation to block its reunification, the inter-Korean relations are again facing a blatant challenge.
					
					 It is the main task of the Korean nation to turn out in a nation-wide struggle for foiling the U.S. harsh hostile policy toward the DPRK and its interference in internal affairs of Korea to block its reunification.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Accuses S. Korean Regime of its Moves to Revise Fascist Law for Worse
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Accuses S. Korean Regime of its Moves to Revise Fascist Law for Worse
						
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the minister of Justice of south Korea cried out for revising the "Security Law" (SL) in such a manner as to forcibly dissolve the "anti-state organizations" and "those benefiting enemy", adding he would push ahead with it as his top priority task this year.
					 The chief executive of south Korea supported his plan.
					
					 This is an unpardonable criminal act of totally stamping out the pro-independence, democracy and reunification forces and pushing the north-south relations to the worst catastrophe.
					
					 The SL fabricated by the Syngman Rhee clique in 1948 is an unheard-of fascist law that brands the DPRK as an enemy. It has been in force to mercilessly suppress south Korean people's patriotic and democratic activities and struggle for national reunification and even trifling acts of political opponents after labeling them "anti-government ones sympathizing with the north."
					
					 Chief executives were replaced by others in south Korea many times but the SL has remained in force and more than one million people had been severely punished by the law until 2013.
					
					 It is as clear as a pikestaff that there would be neither democracy in south Korea nor repaired north-south relations as long as there is such mechanism for harsh dictatorship and institutional barrier that brands compatriots in the north as enemy and incriminates even meeting with them and talking to them.
					
					 The DPRK has never forced its ideology and system upon south Korea but staged the movement for reunification in the idea of the joint declarations the north and the south agreed upon.
					
					 South Korean people have also staged actions in line with the common aspiration of humankind for democracy and in the idea of the programmes for reunification being supported by all Koreans.
					
					 So, the DPRK should not be considered as an enemy of the south Korean authorities nor south Korean people be punished on the charge of "sympathizing with the north."
					
					 It is a mere commonplace that dialogue and cooperation are taking place between countries with differing ideologies and social systems in the world. 
					
					 In the light of not only misfortune and pain all Koreans have suffered but also the global trend, there is neither ground nor justification for the SL to remain in force.
					
					 Nevertheless, the south Korean authorities are working hard to revise the SL for the worse, not content with brutally suppressing the legitimate organizations and personages calling for national reconciliation and reunification by invoking it from the outset of the year.
					
					 Their move is an open challenge to all sincere efforts made by the DPRK to bring about a great turn and change in the north-south relations and an unpardonable act of trampling down the ardent desire and expectation of all Koreans.
					
					 The SL is now not only rejected by all Koreans but censured as an anti-human rights law by international organizations such as the UN and even the U.S.
					
					 The SL should be repealed at once.

articles.title: S. Korean Workers Call for Ensuring Right to Existence
articles.content:
S. Korean Workers Call for Ensuring Right to Existence
						
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- Workers of four companies under the Samsung Group of south Korea held a meeting in Seoul on Jan. 29 calling for ensuring the right to existence.
					 The group decided to unilaterally sell off those four companies in November last year.
					
					 At the meeting speakers said that the business side, once talked about the "confidence" and "understanding", is passing the buck for the management failure to workers.
					
					 The side is threatening to demand compensation, take disciplinary actions and discharge workers struggling for the right to existence, they charged.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Belarus
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Belarus
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Belarus on Jan. 30. 
					 L. Shukolinikov, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Workers' Party of Belarus and chairman of the Permanent Standing Committee of the Belarus National Association of Friends of Korean People Named after Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee consists of representatives from the above-said party and association, the National Social Federation "For the Union and Union's Communist Party", the International Social Federation "For Motherland and Stalin" and the Social Association "For Democracy, Social Progress and Justice". 
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to adopt a congratulatory message to Marshal Kim Jong Un and hold diverse events in Minsk on the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Italy
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Italy
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- An Italian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated on Jan. 30.
					 Alfonso Galdi, director of the International Department of the Leftwing People's Party of Communists of Italy, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize a meeting, seminar and other colorful political and cultural events to praise the sacred revolutionary career and undying exploits of Kim Jong Il in the capital and local areas on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked in Different Countries
						
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Angola and photo and book exhibition and film shows in Guinea, Nigeria and Brazil from Jan. 27 to 29 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 Displayed at the venues were photos showing his noble revolutionary career and undying exploits.
					
					 His works, and photos and books introducing Songun Korea were on show.
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation".
					
					 The general director of an Angolan company in a speech said that not only the Korean people but the world progressives deeply revered HE Kim Jong Il who always found himself among people and devoted himself to their happiness and security. 
					
					 The Korean people will achieve further successes under the leadership of HE Kim Jong Un, identical to Kim Jong Il, the general director said. 
					
					 The commander of the First Commando Force of Almami Samori Toure Barracks of the Guinean Army said Kim Jong Il's Songun leadership was being successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The organizational secretary of the Espirito Santo State Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party noted that the Korean people were living happily under the care of the state by exercising the genuine political right to the full, and praised that all the achievements in the DPRK were attributable to the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Appeal of DPRK Supported by British Organizations
articles.content:
Appeal of DPRK Supported by British Organizations 
						
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK made public a joint statement on Jan. 21 in support of the appeal to all Koreans that was adopted at the joint meeting of the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK. 
					 The statement said that Supreme leader of the DPRK Kim Jong Un in his New Year address put forward important and constructive proposals for achieving Korea's reunification. 
					
					 An appeal calling upon all Koreans in the north and the south and overseas to turn out in the drive for national reunification was made public at the joint meeting, it noted. 
					
					 The appeal said this year marks the 70th anniversary of separation of the nation, the 65th anniversary of the outbreak of the Korean War, the 15th anniversary of the historic June 15 joint declaration and the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation, calling upon all Koreans to turn out in the drive for reunification with ardent patriotism for reunification, it stressed, and went on: 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should give up the daydream of "unification of social systems". 
					
					 This ambition runs counter to the north-south agreements in the past and it is bound to face failure in the end. 
					
					 We fully support the appeal of the joint meeting. 
					
					 It is our firm stand that the U.S. troops have to withdraw from south Korea if Korea is to be reunified on the principle of independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried by Bulgarian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried by Bulgarian Paper
						
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- The full text of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year address was carried by the January issue of Iskra, the Bulgarian paper.
					 The paper also carried his photo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica de Cosmeticos de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica de Cosmeticos de Pyongyang
						
Pyongyang, 5 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un dirigio sobre el terreno la Fabrica de Cosmeticos de Pyongyang.
					Apretando las manos de cada uno de los funcionarios de la fabrica el dijo que en medio de estudiar las ensenanzas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il dadas a la rama de la industria ligera, vino para averiguar el estado de produccion de la fabrica levantada con mucho trabajo del Dirigente y tomar medidas para suministrar al pueblo los cosmeticos mejores en el mundo.
					
					En primer lugar, recorrio el monumento a la orientacion en el terreno y el mural de mosaicos del Dirigente, levantados en el recinto de la fabrica.
					
					Al pasar revista a varios puntos de la fabrica inclusive el taller de cosmeticos, el de jabones de tocador y la sala de muestras, averiguo en detalles del estado de produccion y la administracion e indico el rumbo a seguir por la fabrica.
					
					Como son diferentes el gusto y la demanda de la poblacion sobre los cosmeticos, hay que producir bien la crema, el perfume, la colonia, el arrebol, la brillantina, el jabon de tocador y otros cosmeticos que tienen varias funciones y efectos, dijo y enseno que deben acelerar energicamente el trabajo para desarrollar y producir los cosmeticos naturales, no estimulantes y funcionales.
					
					Dijo que deben elevar constantemente la calidad de los cosmeticos para que nuestro pueblo prefiera nuestros cosmeticos de marca "Unhasu" a los extranjeros y en el futuro los cosmeticos de "Unhasu" tengan reputacion tambien en el mercado mundial.
					
					Y ordeno desplegar con vigor el trabajo para realizar en el nivel mas alto la modernizacion del proceso productivo de la fabrica, equipar con los aparatos de analisis y examen, necesarios a garantizar la calidad de cosmeticos y mantenerlos satisfactoriamente y mejorar los receptaculos de embalaje y los disenos de las marcas conforme a la demanda del nuevo siglo.
					
					Al recorrer la sala de divulgacion de conocimientos cientifico-tecnicos construida nuevamente en la fabrica, el Mariscal dijo que es la corriente actual edificar por doquier la sala de este tipo y normalizar su administracion y enseno la necesidad de gestionarla bien para elevar sin cesar el nivel tecnico y de capacitacion de los empelados.
					
					El Mariscal recorrio tambien el complejo de servicios de higiene Unhasu y evaluo que con sus propias cuentas construyeron bien los establecimientos de servicio publico y los funcionarios de la fabrica estudiaron mucho para ofrecer a los obreros la mejor condicion de vida y el ambiente.
					
					Y dijo que el mismo ayudara personalmente para renovar completamente la Fabrica de Cosmeticos de Pyongyang como digno modelo de las fabricas de cosmeticos de nuestro pais.
					
					El Mariscal senalo que el Partido presta profunda atencion a la Fabrica de Cosmeticos de Pyongyang y agrego que la fabrica debe coronar este ano con el viraje del desarrollo de la industria de cosmeticos. 
					
					Y expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los empleados de la fabrica cumpliran con exito su honrosa mision y se fotografio junto con ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron An Jong Su y Han Kwang Sang, jefes de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Ri Jae Il, primer subjefe de departamento del CC de PTC, y Kim Yo Jong y Sin Man Gyun, subjefes de departamento del CC de PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia equipos de experimento a Universidad Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia equipos de experimento a Universidad Kim Il Sung
						
Pyongyang, 5 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio los modernos equipos de experimento y practica necesarios a la labor docente y la investigacion cientifica.
					El Mariscal, quien tomando la educacion de las generaciones venideras como labor mas importante que decide la prosperidad o ruina del pais, aclaro el radiante camino de la revolucion educacional del nuevo siglo y dispenso la benevolencia de acondicionar mas excelentemente dicha universidad como centro supremo de la autoctona educacion y ciencia.
					
					En los enviados esta reflejado el proposito del Mariscal de glorificar a Corea como pais de educacion y potencia de intelectuales al defender la idea de los grandes generalisimos de dar prioridad a la educacion y sus hazanas y registrar grandes cambios en la labor docente.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a Robert G. Mugabe
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a Robert G. Mugabe
Pyongyang, 5 de febrero (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 3 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de Zimbabwe, Robert G. Mugabe, en relacion con que se efectuo con exito la XXIV Cumbre de la Union Africana y Mugabe fue electo como presidente de la union.
					En la misiva, el remitente senalo que la cumbre devino una ocasion significativa que demostro una vez mas los esfuerzos de los paises africanos por acelerar el proceso de integracion del continente y enfrentarse a los desafios regionales y mundiales, conforme a la demanda de la epoca en desarrollo.
					
					Reafirmando la posicion de la RPDC de fortalecer y desarrollar continuamente las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con los paises africanos, hizo votos por gran avance en los trabajos de la Union Africana por la unidad, el desarrollo, la paz y la prosperidad del continente africano.

articles.title: Portavoz del MINREX condena disparates de Darusman
articles.content:
Portavoz del MINREX condena disparates de Darusman
						
Pyongyang, 5 de febrero (ACNC) -- En relacion con que recientemente, Darusman, llamado "relator especial" sobre la situacion de DDHH de Corea del Consejo de Derechos Humanos de la ONU, calumnio la maxima dignidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 4 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					En una entrevista del dia 2 con AP, el chismeo que "en el Norte de Corea no pueden coexistir los derechos humanos y el poder actual" y se refirio hasta al "cambio de la direccion".
					
					Este disparate identico a la demagogia anti-RPDC del circulo gobernante norteamericano, enviciado con vetar a la RPDC, revela el atributo de ese sucio lacayo que con el disfraz de defensa de DDHH, se ofrecio como vanguardia de la campana hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
					
					Hasta la agencia que se entrevisto con el expreso sorpresas diciendo que sus palabras se pueden escuchar solo en boca de los funcionarios norteamericanos.
					
					La chismografia de Darusman sobre la dignidad de nuestra Direccion Suprema, confiada y apoyada absolutamente por nuestro ejercito y pueblo, resulta un acto verbal estupido y ridiculo que merece el castigo del cielo.
					
					Darusman es el deformado que esta involucrado en el asesinato de 500 mil activistas de la izquierda y del movimiento obrero, cometido en 1965 en Indonesia bajo el patrocinio de la CIA, y vive ahora como parasito en la fundacion de direccion internacional, auspiciada por las personalidades malsanas de EE.UU.
					
					Convertido en el estafador y plumifero sobornado por una miserable suma de EE.UU., esta ahora al frente de la campana de "DDHH" contra la RPDC.
					
					Acorde al guion trazado por EE.UU., el lacayo fiel fabrico a los "testigos" como Sin Tong Hyok y llevandolos por ahi y por aca, fraguo mentiras con que engano a la sociedad internacional e invento la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC.
					
					Al revelarse la falsedad de su documento debido al reconocimiento de Sin sobre sus "testimonios" mentirosos, Darusman quiere justificar su invento diciendo que esta basado en los "testimonios" de cientos de personas.
					
					Darusman debe publicar ahora mismo la lista de cientos de "fugitivos norcoreanos" con que el dice haberse reunido.
					
					Entonces, revelaremos uno por uno la naturaliza criminal de todos los "testigos" farsantes, inventados por el. 
					
					Se revelara aun mas a todo el mundo la verdad de la campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de Darusman y EE.UU. que lo ha empleado.
					
					No perdonaremos ni en lo minimo a cualquier tipejo que atente contra nuestra maxima dignidad y defenderemos hasta el final nuestro regimen socialista, el mejor del mundo. Esto es nuestro temperamento y voluntad que no se cambiaran nunca.
					
					Nos enfrentaremos con intransigencia y hasta el final a la demencial campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC que lanzan EE.UU. y las fuerzas hostiles por conducto de los elementos sucios como Darusman.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak no podra evitar la sentencia de historia, afirma CRPP
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak no podra evitar la sentencia de historia, afirma CRPP
						
Pyongyang, 5 de febrero (ACNC) -- En sus "memorias" recien publicadas, Lee Myung Bak, convertido en cadaver vivo por la dura sentencia de la nacion, calumnio atrevidamente a la RPDC tergiversando el proceso de contacto Norte-Sur a puertas cerradas.
					En su declaracion publicada hoy, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria condena que la conducta de Lee deja conocer su aspecto de idiota y causa la consternacion y burla de toda la gente, y prosigue:
					
					Esta vez, Lee invirtio la verdad del proceso de debates sobre la cumbre intercoreana, lo cual resulta el climax de su cinismo.
					
					Podemos dar a la publicidad todos los detalles al respecto. 
					
					A decir en breve, cada vez que sufria la crisis de gobernacion durante su mandato, el traidor Lee mendigo a la RPDC el "envio de enviado especial" y la "cumbre" hablando como si estuviera dispuesto a hacer grandes favores.
					
					Tenemos todas las pruebas para confirmar esos hechos.
					
					El comportamiento descarado de Lee ha demostrado una vez mas a todo el mundo su imagen de politiquero corrupto y grosero.
					
					Detras de la publicacion apresurada de sus "memorias" llenas de mentiras, hay la siniestra intencion de Lee de eludir la responsabilidad de haber llevado a la fase catastrofica las relaciones intercoreanas, congelar la corriente de la mejora de relaciones Norte-Sur que toma en auge en estos ultimos dias e inducir en error la opinion publica que denuncia sus crimenes.
					
					Estamos seriamente preocupados de si podemos discutir los asuntos importantes de la nacion con los tipos groseros surcoreanos como Lee que invierte lo negro en lo blanco.
					
					Seria justo que ese traidor sea castigado por la historia luego de escribir la "cronica de sus crimenes" reflexionando de sus actos traidores a la nacion.
					
					Observaremos atentamente como se desenvolvera la situacion en el suelo surcoreano.
